channel.title: Help with alert
channel.description: i am trying to add command alert to my server but when i added alerthandler.java into my client it gives me this error [code]AlertHandler.java:56: aTextDrawingArea_1271 has private access in client c.aTextDrawingArea_1271.drawTest(alert.getTitleColor(), alert.getTitle(), alert.getY()+15, alert.getX()+242);[/code] any ideas?

item.title: Help with alert

item.description:

did you do the whole tutorial?
